organizations.name: machine gun kelly & camila cabello camila

text: Camila's vocal are amazing! üòç - @EbonySahyoune Biography Born: 22 April 1990 in Houston, TX Genre: Hip-Hop/Rap Years Active: '10s Delivering lyrics with the speed of a bullet train, Cleveland rapper Machine Gun Kelly (aka MGK) experienced a meteoric rise in late 2011. Born Richard Colson Baker in Texas but raised in the Cleveland suburb of Shaker Heights, MGK began making news in 2009 when he became the first rapper to win amateur night at Harlem's Apollo Theater. A series of mixtapes, including 100 Words and Running, Lace Up, and Rage Pack, came next; a 2011 performance at SXSW was followed immediately by a meeting with Sean...
